gen:link.msg:message: `AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfAccrualsAndDeferredIncomeCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfAccrualsAndDeferredIncomeCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfAccrualsAndDeferredIncomeCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfAccrualsAndDeferredIncomeCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdvancesReceivedTuitionFees` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `po`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_AdvancesReceivedTuitionFees')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_AdvancesReceivedTuitionFees return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdvancesReceivedTuitionFees` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `vo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_AdvancesReceivedTuitionFees')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_AdvancesReceivedTuitionFees return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_LiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_LiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
